text: Sliač is a spa town in central Slovakia. It is on the river Hron, between Banská Bystrica and Zvolen. About 5,000 people live there. The town is known for its hot springs. It has an airport. == Twin towns == Sliač is twinned with: * Přibyslav, Czech Republic == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Spa towns in Slovakia Category:Banská Bystrica Region
title: Sliač
